identity.name: busfactor AI
identity.emotional_tone: The 'Clean Lab' - A sterile, high-performance environment where code and context meet.

layout_strategy.global: h-screen w-screen overflow-hidden bg-background flex flex-col

top_pane.styles: flex flex-col border-b border-border bg-white relative z-10

split_screen.resizer: h-1.5 bg-slate-100 hover:bg-blue-500/50 cursor-row-resize transition-colors w-full flex items-center justify-center

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium text-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium text-sm
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-md text-sm
buttons.icon: h-9 w-9 p-0 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center hover:bg-slate-100

inputs.default: flex h-9 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50
inputs.chat: min-h-[44px] rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 focus:bg-white transition-all shadow-inner resize-none

cards.interactive: rounded-xl border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm hover:border-blue-200 hover:shadow-md transition-all cursor-pointer

tabs.container: inline-flex h-9 items-center justify-center rounded-lg bg-muted p-1 text-muted-foreground
tabs.trigger: inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-md px-3 py-1 text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-all focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 data-[state=active]:bg-background data-[state=active]:text-foreground data-[state=active]:shadow

chat.bubble_user: bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm px-4 py-2 max-w-[80%] text-sm shadow-sm
chat.bubble_agent: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-800 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm px-4 py-2 max-w-[80%] text-sm shadow-sm

general: Use the provided image URLs for all agent avatars and branding.
Implement the split-screen layout with a draggable handle if possible, or fixed 50/50 split if complex.
Ensure the 'Builder' section (bottom) feels distinct from the 'Chat' section (top) using the background grid pattern.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give it that technical dashboard feel.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds; stick to clean white/slate surfaces.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
layout_implementation: Header: Fixed height (h-14), border-b, flex items-center px-4 justify-between bg-white.
Main Content: Flex-1 flex flex-col overflow-hidden.
Top Pane (Chat): Flex-1 flex flex-col min-h-[30%] max-h-[70%].
Bottom Pane (Builder): Flex-1 bg-slate-50 border-t border-slate-200 relative.

specific_pages.dashboard: The main entry point. Contains the 4 agent tabs in the header or sidebar.
specific_pages.code_health_agent: Needs a form for PR Input. Use Shadcn Form components.
specific_pages.employee_agent: Needs a Role Selector (Engineer/Manager). Use Shadcn Select or ToggleGroup.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤– for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
